item.title: CRYPTO WORLD EVOLUTION
item.dc:creator: Trevor272
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" background_color="#000000" admin_label="section" _builder_version="3.0.89" border_width_all="3px" border_color_all="#e09900" border_style_all="groove" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px"][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

CRYPTO WORLD EVOLUTION

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" specialty="on" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="2_3" specialty_columns="2" _builder_version="3.0.47"][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding="21.875px|0px|2px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column_inner type="4_4" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

WHO IS CRYPTO WORLD EVOLUTION (CWE)?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding="21.875px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column_inner type="4_4" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

Crypto World Evolution or CWE (pronounced by some as see-wee) is a company whose vision, as they put it themselves is, "...to create a worldwide Company that empowers an individual to enhance their lifestyle through our sophisticated crypto currency trading software and corresponding innovative marketing techniques". What this means is that CWE is taking the kind of software once reserved for professional traders and those with the capital to buy it to the general public.

They are a relatively new company but are already showing results with their patented trading bot software. Their software is extremely powerful and, more importantly,accessible. It's designed to mitigate risk, never lose you money (if you are patient enough) and literally trade while you sleep.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column_inner type="4_4" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

WHAT MAKES CWE UNIQUE?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

First and foremost is the pricing. CWE leases their software starting at $500 USD per year. That's about $1.37 USD a day. Or the price of a cup of coffee from a convenient store. Or you can go for their more robust package at $2,000 USD per year. Or about $5.50 USD per day. About the price of one of those iced coffee drinks with all the whipcream and a cool looking cup :-)

Aside from the pricing, what really makes the CWE opportunity unique is the type of access it gives you for the money. CWE currently works with four major cryptocurrency exchanges:Binance,Bittrex,Okek andHitbtc. They currently are holding negotiations with several other established exchanges and are a rapidly growing company.

They are also unique in their focus on the world of cryptocurrencies. This is a market that has seen incredible growth in recent months and, despite what you may hear on the news. this growth does not show any signs of slowing down.

It is a truly unique opportunity if you have the right combination of patience and perspective to take advantage of it.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

Disclaimer: Please understand that, as a matter of compliance, we are not allowed to show images of our CWE accounts or any of the company's official logos on this website. If you want to know more, email us at admin@bitcoinbuildify.comand we will be happy to show you in a private appointment. With that said, the system works like this:

1. Once you pay for the software (payment is made in Bitcoin) you will receive access to the software. No download or installation is necessary.

2. Next, you will need to generate an API key for the exchange you want to put your trading bots on. This process will vary depending on which exchange you decide to work with. And, by the way, you can put bots on as many compatible exchanges as you want as long as you have the funds (0.01 BTC per bot) to activate them.

3. After you plug your API key into your CWE package, you can begin creating and naming your robots. Each robot will select 15 cryptocurrency coins by default. You can add or remove coins as you like but the bots will not go active until they have 15 coins to work with.

4. Once your bots are active on the exchange, you will have access to any and all coins on that exchange. The bots will handle the back end while you focus on either the parameters of your trade or simply let them go to work and choose the coins for you.

Your account will remain active for 365 days from the date of purchase.

WHAT DO THE BOTS DO?

CWE offers three types of bots: the HPSI, the HYBRID and the WIN-WIN

HPSI:This trading bot is available with both the $500 USD and $2000 USD package. It could be called their flagship bot as it isfully automated. That is, it is possible to simply let it run and check in when you feel like it. It will never close a trade at a loss and will scan the markets and execute trades 24 hours a day for as long as you let it run. It is designed for newbie traders with little or no experience trading. Although, it could be a nice asset for more experienced traders who face the common problem of having more opportunity than time. This bot does have a manual overried option so you can stop, sell, or buy as you like. You can also add and remove the different coins it is trading.

HYBRID:Available with bothwith both the $500 USD and $2000 USD package. This bot carries the same basic functionality of the HPSI. But, as the name "hybrid" implies, it has the added advantage of allowing you to custom design orders and set specific parameters. These parameters include such factors as: which coin to buy, stop loss percent and/or BTC price, how much BTC to invest, and how much coin to buy. It will then scan the markets and move on your order at the optimum time. This bot is designed for more experienced traders from intermediate to advanced.

WIN-WIN: This bot is only available with the $2000 USD package. It is CWE's ace in the whole. Designed specifically for the volatility of the crypto markets it is geared to make steady trades when the price of BTC is "more volatile". It also allows transactions between BTC and USDT. This bot is designed for traders of all experience levels.

 

THE $500 USD VS. THE $2000 USD PACKAGE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column_inner type="1_2" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

$500 USD GETS YOU:

  • Access to two trading bots: the HPSI and the HYBRID
  • A $2500 trading limit in current BTC value
  • Access to all coins trading with BTC on: Binance,Bittrex,Okek andHitbtc
  • 365-day license
  • 90 days to upgrade to the $2000 USD package by paying the additional $1500 USD difference
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type="1_2" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

$2000 USD GETS YOU:

  • Access to three trading bots: HPSI, HYBRID and the WIN-WIN
  • $10,000 USD trading limit in current BTC value
  • Access to all coins trading with BTC on: Binance,Bittrex,Okek andHitbtc
  • 365-day license
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding="3px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column_inner type="4_4" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

Basically, the essential difference between the two packages is that the $2000 USD package gives you 1) a higher trading limit of $10,000 USD in current Bitcoin value and 2) access to a third, more powerful "Trade8" trading bot.

A nice feature is that CWE allows 90 days to upgrade to their $2000 USD package by simply paying the extra $1500 USD in BTC value. This could prove to be the next natural step in a beginning trader's progression; especially if you see enough gains in your first three months to make the purchase easier.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding="29.6875px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column_inner type="4_4" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

HOW CAN I GET STARTED?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

The signup process is quite simple. However, we don't believe in simply putting a button on our website and leaving the rest to you. If you are interested in signing up with CWE, send us an email at admin@bitcoinbuildifyand we will get back to you (usually in less than 48 hours). We don't automate our email system and we don't simply give you an affiliate link without first talking things over with you. You can schedule an appointment with us and we'd be happy to chat.

As for how the process works:

after you schedule an appointment on of our representatives will get in touch with you either through Skype or Zoom.

we will show you one of our accounts and how the interface works

we will make sure you understand what the technology does and what the potential risks and rewards of the crypto currency markets are

once this is all clear, you will be emailed a link from CWE support. Once you click on the link you will be required to take a short quiz to make sure you are clear on what the software can and can't do for you

after that we can walk you through the process of connecting your account to one of the compatible cryptocurrency exchanges, how to start your robots and anything else you need to know.

WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO GET STARTED

1. The equivalent of either $500 or $2000 USD in Bitcoin. We recommend you set aside slightly more (1-2% more) to cover any transaction fees and fluctuations in the price of Bitcoin.

2. A valid email address

3. An account with at least one of the four cryptocurrency exchanges CWE currently works with: Binance, Bittrex, Okek and/or Hitbtc. You can deploy your robots onto one or all of the exchanges. However, you will need to have 0.1 BTC per robot for it to go active and start trading.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding="0px|0px|1px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column_inner type="4_4" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

WHY USE SOFTWARE TO TRADE?

The fact is that the same trend of computers doing everything bigger, better and faster is also happening in the world of finance. The type of software CWE uses can execute hundreds of trades a second and both predict and react to market trends the average human being wouldn't even notice.

This kind of software package is designed to:

  • preserve a high level of indendence for the trader using it: Yes, it does have a 100% automated mode where you can just walk away and come back whenever you like to see how things have been going. BUT, you can also take advantage of the automated override option if you feel like you want to try something different or have some news you think will cause a surge in the market
  • mitigate risk:this is to basically stop you from doing anything stupid or from losing what you have while you are away from the exchanges. Remember, the crypto exchanges run 24/7 365 days a year. While mitigating risk, they can also do the same for stress. Anyone who has ever even dabbled in crypto trading can tell you that watching the exchanges can bestressful. Take a load off and let the AI bots lighten some of the load. Emotion is the biggest enemy for a successful trader.
  • ensure control of your funds: a lot of cryptocurrency platforms out there, whether mining or contracted trading, will essentially lock your funds in their own system for the duration of the contract. On the one hand, it can ensure a certain level of passivity. On the other, it requires a high degree of trust and also means your invested funds will be unavailable if you happen to need them. With CWE, your funds are kept in your account on the exchanges. The AI bots have no control over them whatsoever and you can simply just turn them off if you don't like where they're going with trading your funds.
  • detect and act on trends:again: Artificial Intelligence. Total concentration and processing to a degree we would have trouble maintaing for more than a few seconds. The bottom line is, this type of software can detect things you can't.
  • execute trades at superhuman speeds: computers arefast. Like,really fast. The exact parameters of CWE's software touches on the area of commercial secrecy but we can tell you that they are capable of executing complex trade decisions in real time at the rate of several hundred a second.

Combine these factors into one, affordable proven platformwith the level of accuracy and responsiveness of CWE's AI trading software and you have a powerful ally on the exchanges.

PROS AND CONS OF THE CWE A.I. TRADING PLATFORM

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding="0px|0px|8px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column_inner type="1_2" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

PROS:

  • gives users full independence and control of their cryptocurrency funds: this is actually a massive advantage and somewhat unusual in the world of cryptocurrency service platforms. With mining, for example, your funds will often be locked in a contract for anywhere from a month to 3 years.
  • offers amazing potential for trading: there are no guarantees of course. But in a market as relatively new and full of potential as the crypto market is, this type of software carries some serious potential to generate returns.
  • combines a nice mix of passive, automated trading with the HPSI bot and a more active option with the HYBRID or WIN-WIN bots:we like the blend of options available with CWE. Trading can be stressful and extremely time consuming. The bots temper both these elements and allow you to be a little more at ease about the markets when you're not logges on to the exchanges.
  • allows trading opportunity 24/7: this is something that just can't be beat. The bots never fatigue and they are always on the lookout for the best deal. The fact that the crypto exchanges run 24/7 also vastly increases the amount of activity and opportunity that will come your way. Having the bots on your side makes it all that much better.
  • exellent customer service:CWE has excellent customer service and is very careful about compliance. This means they are focused on living up to what they advertise and keeping their customer base happy. Always a nice sign for those of us on the user end.
  • mitigates a good amount of the risk involved with crypto trading: there are no guarantees here but the software is designed to keep you on the winning end of any trading activity you get involved in. Trading is risky and AI can help to mitigate some of that risk.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][et_pb_column_inner type="1_2" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

CONS:

  • comparatively expensive buy in: depending on which "league" you play in CWE's products could be either an amazing deal or way out of your budget range. Whether or not it's worth it comes down to a mix of three factors: 1) your trading experience 2) your budget and 3) your level of commitment to cryptocurrency technology.
  • despite the quality of the software there is no guarantee of profitable returns: although the software is designed to mitigate as much risk as possible, there is absolutely no guarantee you will profit in your cryptocurrency trading with CWE's AI bots. The best the bots can do is increase your chances not to fail. Trading can be a dicey game no matter what market your in and using AI is no replacement for AI bots, common sense and due dilligence.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding="0px|0px|29.6875px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column_inner type="4_4" saved_specialty_column_type="2_3" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

OVERALL REVIEW:

All in all we feel CWE is offering a quality platform at a reasonable price. No, it is not a magical solution to your trading goals. And, no, it won't guarantee any profit. But it will maximize your trading capacity on the exchanges. This doesn't mean you will become a crypto millionaire overnight. Those cases are few and far between. What going with CWE does mean is that you will have a quality AI platform helping you to make good, unemotional decisions on the exchanges 24/7.

The AI package gives you an advantage because it is:

unemotional: any successful trader will tell you that emotion is the greatest enemy. Whether it's FUD (Fear Uncertainty and Doubt), FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out) or just plain jumping the gun to see what happens, chances are you will find emotion rarely brings any kind of returns and will more likely bring a loss. We've been there ourselves and can personally attest to the fact that it's no fun.

extremely fast: computers can move with a speed an accuracy on the exchanges that would trump any trader. CWE's AI is also desgined to detect and track trends a human being may not be able to detect.

always active:this is actually a crucial selling point of this technology. Since the crypto exchanges are active 24/7 things can and often do happen while you are logged off or even asleep. Sometimes, you can miss a massive opportunity and not know it until well after its passed. On the crypto markets, this can mean a few hours or even a few minutes can make all the difference.

patient: this one ties into the first point of being unemotional. Just as emotion can be the worst enemy, patience can be the greatest friend. And AI ispatient. It's designed to execute immediately on the best opportunityas soon as it happens.

WHAT TO EXPECT:

CWE's technology is just as susceptible to market trends as any human trader. This means that, if the market is down, it would be unwise to expect your bots to make any significant profits. The action happens when the changes do. That is when the market is rising or falling, the bots will jump into actionto capitalize on the fluctuations in value between different currencies.

So, you will also need some patience, too. It may take a few days or even a few weeks for you to start making returns in your trading. The trick is to let the bots run and, if you feel like doing something in the meantime, take a look at what coins the bots are trading and why.

FINAL THOUGHTS:

Cryptocurrency exchanges are open to just about anyone and there has never been a time like this before. Cryptocurrencies and the technology they are engendering are really only beginning. As, Bitcoin enthusiast, Roger Ver said in regard to where we are in terms of the spread and use of cryptocurrency technology: "we haven't even started the game".

So, we really have a ton of potential here. Indeed, unprecedented potential for gains and, conversely, a high potential for loss. If you are not absolutely sure of what you are doing, your money can be gone in the blink of an eye. The value of a given cryptocurrency can fluctuate by as much as 20% in 24 hours; sometimes more.

It is a volatile market that is affected by a huge number of factors. Even seasoned veterans from Wall Street can still get blindsided. Thats because it is also a small market. And changes that may register as only a tiny hiccup on the more traditional exchanges can send the cryptomarket into a tailspin. Also, cryptocurrency exchanges, unlike the traditional stock and forex exchanges, run 24 hours a day 7 days a week. Which means that somebody somewhere is always trading. And deals will becoming and going with or without you being logged in.

Whatever people may say, the crypotocurrency trading world is an active one. And, personally, we fell that if you have an interest in exploring it but don't, there is a chance you will regret it.

STILL CURIOUS?

If you would like to know more about how CWE works, send us an email at:

admin@bitcoinbuildify.com

Be sure to include:

  • your first name
  • what service you are interested in
  • how best to correspond with you.

We prefer Zoom or Skype as this is the fastest and most direct way to show you how the tech works and to take care of any questions you may have. But we're ok with email, too.

We have a little more of an old school approach to servicing our clients:

  • no automated emails,
  • no affiliate link buttons
  • no hiding who we are

We believe in quality over quantity and want our customers to have a full understanding and appreciation of what theyre getting into. This helps us just as much as it helps you.

Once you send us an email, a real human will get in touch with you within 48 hours at the most. None of the information you share with us will be made available to any 3rd parties without first getting your interest and permission to do so. We hate spam just as much as you do.

If you are a spammer, you will be put directly straight onto our naughty list :-(

Have a nice day.

BITCOIN BUILDIFY: MAKING CRYPTO EASY

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3" _builder_version="3.0.47"][et_pb_sidebar area="sidebar-1" _builder_version="3.0.89"][/et_pb_sidebar][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section]

item.title: MINTAGE MINING
item.dc:creator: Trevor272
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" specialty="on" _builder_version="3.0.89" custom_padding="54px|0px|0px|0px"][et_pb_column type="3_4" specialty_columns="3" _builder_version="3.0.47"][et_pb_row_inner custom_padding="29.6875px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column_inner type="4_4" saved_specialty_column_type="3_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" box_shadow_position="outer" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_image src="http://bitcoinbuildify.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/2018-02-28_18h26_31.png" show_in_lightbox="on" align="center" _builder_version="3.0.89"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

Watch or listen to the video if you don't have time to read the entire article.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_video src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BvHvoIis7CA" _builder_version="3.0.89" max_width="79%" module_alignment="center" box_shadow_style="preset2"][/et_pb_video][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

WHY MINTAGE MINING?

Mintage Miningoffers all of the elements that are desirable in a mining platform package and basically none of the elements that arent. Instead of a mining pool, Mintage mining is a miningplatform;. That is, they offer the ability for non-techies and non-miners to get involved in mining with none of the upfront investment in time, equipment or education not to mention commitment. They are also able to coordinate with multiple mining pools and to leverage the best offers in a way that brings the most value to those who buy in to the weekly contracts. You could think of them as a brokerage which is able to coordinate among various offers and expertly negotiate the most profitable deals. They make the tough decisions, you simply give what you can to help fund the the operation and accumulate the returns they are able to generate.

Essentially, mining pools need funding. Without it, they would soon go belly up. Mining isexpensive.And it is becoming increasingly more so all the time.The electricity costs alone would put most people off the idea altogether. There also considerable costs involved for competitive hardware, maintanance, skilled technicians on top of the sheer amount of time required to run a profitable mining operation; to be competitive, a mining operation must run 24/7 to ensure optimum efficiency and profitability. All the while there is the risk of malfunction or systems going down altogether. Unless you have the technical skill and human capital to manage this type of situation, this is probably a risk you dont want to take.

What Mintage is able to do is offer the mining pools it works with pure capital (Show me the money!). There is nothing a business with high overhead needs more than pure capital. Cash is what keeps the machine running. However, Mintage doesnt just give the money no questions asked. They delegate it based on the results of which coins their AI bots predict will be most profitable through their hyper-intelligent market analysis. Consider the AI tech an ace up Mintages sleeve that allows them to target their mining focus. The money you give Mintage is used to purchase "hashpower" (computing power) in various mining pools. In Mintage's system, each "mining unit", or "hashpower unit" as they are also called, is equivelant to $1 USD. Each user will get a certain return per mining unit each week based on Mintage's performance for that week.For the end user, this makes the Mintage system remarkably transparent and easy to understand.

Moreover, Mintage is able to change up which coins they focus onevery week. Remember, they dont handle the backend of mining. They simply provide capital to mining pools they want to work with. So, what this means is, Mintage is able to zero in on the money without hurting anyones feelings. They are not invested in one type of hardware or one type of coin. They are invested in following the most profitable mining trends based on what the market needs. And they have a hyper-efficient system using artificial intelligence to help them do it.

HOW IS THE CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE WITH MINTAGE MINING?

On top of the exceptional quality of the platform, Mintage Mining also excels as a company to work with. Lets be honest, with the unregulated nature of the cryptocurrency markets, there are a huge number of scams out there. Further, there is almost no recourse if you fall victim to one. This is one reason why it is extremely important to research the company you are considering going with; the responsibility as to how things go will lie with you and you alone.

So, that said, let us layout some reasons why we are happy with our experience as customers of Mintage Mining thus far:

  • they are very forward and transparent about their activity:this point is crucial. If a mining operation is not transparent about previous results, their hashpower and other factors concerning the concrete metrics of their operation it is the equivalent of investing in a construction company that cannot show you a single example of their work. With Mintage mining, the numbers add up. And so do the results. Their mining results are posted weekly on their website and no membership is necessary to view them. They also give a breakdown of the distribution of their hashpower as to which coins they will be focusing on in the coming week of mining. Mintage uses AI to determine which coins will be most profitable to mine based on trends in the market that only a computer or very experienced trader could detect.
  • they are constantly working to improve their platform and bring more benefits to their customers:Mintage has proven to be a very forward thinking company that is still just in the beginning of implementing what they want to do. For the time being they deliver capital in order to buy hashpower. But we here they will soon be starting their own mining operation using their own equipment. They are also expanding their team building options and chances for their customers to benefit even more from the platform.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47"][et_pb_sidebar area="sidebar-1" _builder_version="3.0.89"][/et_pb_sidebar][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="3.0.89" custom_padding="2px|0px|0px|0px"][et_pb_row custom_padding="6px|0px|27px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

HOW DOES MINTAGE MINING WORK?

1.When you pay into the hashpower bucket, your BTC is converted into "mining units". Each mining unit is the equivalent of $1 USD (the number of mining units will be determined by the price of BTC in USD at the time of deposit. Mintage offers two mining unit contracts: 1 year and 3 year.

2. Once purchased, the mining units will generate a return in Bitcoin each week for the life of the contract. The returns will be deposited into your wallet every Wednesday. Mintage will then send you an email notifying you of the deposit. The deposit will display in both USD/Mining Units and BTC. The number of units is determined by the exchange rate between USD and BTC at the time of deposit.

3. You can either A) withdraw your deposit and use it as you like orB) put it back into your mining units to generate a higher relative return the following week. Each time you redeposit back into your active mining units, a new contract will be initiated.When the contract is over, the mining units will expire and your active mining units will reset to zero.

HOW DO THE PAYOUTS WORK?

Mintage mining will pay a weekly dividend into each customers wallet (which they provide in your account) on a weekly basis. This is paid out in Bitcoin and is transferrable out of your wallet or back into a 1 or 3 year contract with Mintage. Payments are based on the amount of Bitcoin distributed into your wallet (the percentage you get per mining unit as your weekly payout) times the price of Bitcoin in USD at the time of deposit (weekly BTC payout x current BTC price in USD = your weekly payment in USD). It's a lot simpler than it sounds.

Let's keep the numbers easy and round for the sake of this example. Let's say the price of Bitcoin at the time of your deposit is $10,000 USD and you put exactly $1,000 USD (0.1 Bitcoin or 1,000 mining/hashpower units into a 1 year Mintage Mining contract). At the end of your first week, Mintage delivers a 2% return through their mining network. You would get 2% per active unit which would equal $20 USD or 0.002 Bitcoin (2% of 0.1 is 0.002). Take a look below for a clearer example:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="3.0.89" custom_padding="0px|0px|54px|0px"][et_pb_row custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_image src="http://bitcoinbuildify.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/mintage-payout-equation.jpg" _builder_version="3.0.89" max_width="75%" module_alignment="center"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]Not bad for simply leaving your money in a mining contract, no? The amazing part is you can either withdraw your BTC or put it back into a mining contract on top of your original principal to start a new contract with 1020 units for the next mining batch. This option is available weekly and, with the compounded interest effect, could show signigicant growth over time. To see what we mean, look at the diagram below: [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

Week 1

Starting Balance: $1000 USD

Payout: 2%/ $20 USD

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

Week 2

Starting Balance: $1020 USD

Payout: 2%/ $20.40 USD

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

Week 3

Starting Balance: $1040.40 USD

Payout: 2%/$ 20.81USD

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

Week 4

Starting Balance: $1082.43USD

Payout:2% $21.65 USD

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="0px|0px|21px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

The progression above is for example only and assumes two factors: 1) a constant return of 2% and 2) no fluctuations in the price of Bitcoin. The truth is results will vary. Some weeks Mintage is able to get a higher or lower return percentage from its mining and some weeks the price of Bitcoin will be higher or lower. Either way, the system is designed to payout very generously and we have had absolutely no problems thus far.

This kind of opportunity is quite rare in the world of cryptocurrency mining offers. Oftentimes, internal fees and the chopping up of revenue will decimate what ends up in your account. Mintage keeps it straight and posts all of their data concerning results along with the math to support it.

IMPORTANT POINT:

The money you put into your active mining units goes to the company.

What you get are the weekly payouts. If you start small, a good option is to keep redepositing your payouts back into your active units. Once the total of your active units are generating a good weekly return, you can simply let the contract run until it completes either 1 or 3 years after your final deposit. Then you will be able to do with your wallet balance as you like. If youreally want to see good returns, we highly recommend the 3 year contract. Yes, it's more of a time commitment but you'll thank yourself for it.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

OTHER FACTORS THAT MAKE MINTAGE MINING AN EXCELLENT OPTION

  • they have excellent customer service:this is also a crucial element. And not just in cryptocurrency mining of course. There is nothing more frustrating than contacting a company only to hear nothing back; especially if you have funds invested. With Mintage Mining, the average turnaround time for an email response has been less than 24 hours. This tells you that A) they care about the customer experience and B) are doing well enough in their operations to have staff on hand to field inquiries. This may not seem like that big of a deal but you would be surprised how lacking customer s
  • they target different coins based on current trends in the markets:in a market subject to fluctuations as much as cryptocurrencies are, a coin that is profitable one day may not be so the next. Mintage mining uses AI to target trends in the market to project which coins will be most profitable in the coming week of mining. What this means is that their contracts will behighly targetedensuring a more than fare chance that your returns will be optimized. Further, they publicly post (no membership required) the coins to be mined in their upcoming contract. That is, you can see which coins the company is going to go for ahead of time. This is extremely valuable information to have.
  • they are fully compliant with US law (among other countries):remember that part about the world of cryptocurrencies being rife with scams? Well, Mintage Mining isnt one of them. The United States is one of the strictest countries in the world when it comes to cryptocurrencies. And Mintage Mining is fully accessible and legit for US citizens. This may not seem like much at first but, if you take a look at what else is out there, you will begin to appreciate Mintage's flair for compliance and transparency. There is no shortage of stories of people who, through their own lack of research and over-excitement have lost out big time on what turned out to be a scam. The more transparent, communicative and clear about compliance a company is, the more trustworthy they are PERIOD. And Mintage excels in all three of these areas.

HOW DO I GET STARTED?

Its a pretty straightforward system. Basically, you:

1. Register an account:Mintage has three options to join under:

OPTION 1 - FREE MEMBER: (LOWEST COMMITMENT)

no cost to join

limit of 300 active mining units at one time.

no referral program or team building options.

While quite limited in potential for returns, the free member signup is good option to test the platform without paying any signup fees. This is an entry level option for someone either looking to test the platform or simply put a small amount away somewhere to diversify their crypto portfolio.

OPTION 2 - ELITE MEMBER (BEST OPTION):

$125 USD cost throughNUI Social (another amazing cryptocurrency platform).

No extra cost to join Mintage

unlimited active mining units

generous affiliate and team building options

10% bonus on purchases from your referrals

bonuses and override mining units from team activity

This is Mintage's most comprehensive package and carries the highest potential for prolonged profitability. Signing up for the Elite Member option will give you access to both the Mintage and NUI platform for 1 year. This is recommended for anyone wanting to really grow their crypto holdings and/or get involved in team building and making referrals. However, it should be noted that, although the option for team building and referring both NUI and Mintage's services is included in this plan it is by no means mandatory. Just want to get in with NUI and Mintage but don't want to try to sell their stuff? No problem. You don't have to.

OPTION 3 - PRO MEMBER (MORE LIMITED THAN ELITE MEMBER):

unlimited active mining units

no team building or referral options

no bonus or override options

$500 USD account activation fee

The Pro Member option would be for someone who just want to buy into Mintage's platform and doesn't have an interest in any of NUI's services, team building options or bonus/overried activities.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

2. Once you have opened an account, make your deposit into the weekly bucket:Mintage offers their mining unit purchase using a "bucket system". Each bucket has 500,000 units available or roughly $500,000 USD. The remaining availability for each weekly bucket is posted on their homepage along with what coins will be mined (no membership necessary to view this info. Simply go to mintagemining.com and scroll down the homepage to get all the data). Once Thursday of the next week comes or the bucket reaches 100% capacity (whichever comes first) that bucket will close and all mining units will be locked in for one year. Each mining unit is the equivalent of $1 USD which makes the system very easy to understand and work with. If a "bucket" closes before you have a chance to get in, don't worry. Another one will open.

3. Wait for your results:Each week on Wednesday you will receive a percentage of the mining results per unit in your deposit. One unit equals approximately one US dollar. You will receive an email notifying you of the deposit into your account. You are free to either withdraw your payout or (HIGHLY RECOMMENDED) repurchase another 1 or 3 year contract with it.

Recently, Mintage has begun displaying their weekly results in cents instead of percentages. Take the example below:

  • in one week Mintage is able to pay out 2.5% or 2.5 cents ($ 0.025 USD) per mining unit
  • you have 1000 units active in your contract
  • 1000 x .025 = 25 new units for that week (you have made $25 USD for simply leaving your BTC on Mintage's mining platform).
  • your payout will appear in the BTC wallet which Mintage provides in your account. The balance will display in both Bitcoin and United States Dollars (BTC and USD respectively).

4. Repeat:if you really want to see growth in your Mintage holdings, you would be well advised to deposit your weekly payouts back into a new 1-year contract. This makes the difference between A) a mining platform giving you a few bucks a week to play with or B) turning it into a serious investment over time.

Here is the reason why: each time you add your weekly payout back into a new 1-year contract, it will be added to all other mining units you have contracted with Mintage (Yes, your mining units generate compound interestin Bitcoin). This is the key to really leveraging the opportunity here. Sure, it's nice to have a few extra bucks a week to play around with but it's a much smarter move to reinvest it back into the cycle. After a few years doing that, you will have a whole lot more than a few bucks to play with!

As the late great Albert Einstein said:

"Compound interest is the eighth wonder of the world. He who understands it, earns it ... he who doesn't ... pays it.Compound interest is the most powerful force in the universe.Compound interest is the greatest mathematical discovery of all time."

Our advice? Be smart. Play the long game and reinvest your gains back into your active units. You'll be glad you did. Seriously.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="27px|0px|8px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

PROS AND CONS OF MINTAGE MINING

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="27px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

PROS:

  • excellent payment structure: the interface is simple and payment amounts clear - across the board. The cummulative effect of reinvesting your payouts back into your active mining units pool is also something to take note of; especially if you are looking to build an investment over time.
  • customer service is top level: we've never waited more than 24 hours to hear back after contacting Mintage via email. They have been kind, personable and very communicative in their responses. No waiting, no wonder, no stressing. They also update you automatically when a payout is posted into your account. This is a nice touch that lets you get the jump on the next availalbe hashpower bucket.
  • all transactions occur in BTC: regardless of what coins the company is involved with in their mining contracts, all deposits and payouts occur strictly in BTC. This keeps it simple and above all: profitable. One cryptocurrency, one wallet, one address.
  • company allows a reinvest option: company also allows you to reinvest it back into your pool of active units generating a compound interest effect. This can prove enormously profitable over time.
  • company allows a withdrawal option: you can withdraw your BTC payouts to do with as you like. This is a great option if you feel your active units pool is big enough to let run awhile without paying any more in. However, if you want to see more growth on your principal, pay it back in. Pay it back in.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

CONS:

  • requires a 1 year contract minimum: most mining platforms will lock your funds in for a contracted period, it's what gives them the liquidity needed to stay competitive and gain the most from their contributed capital. What you gain in passivity you sacrifice in control. It's not the end of the world but is something to be considered if you are of the hardcore "HODLer" slant.
  • payouts are weekly not daily:with MIntage Mining you get paid once a week. If you are more of the "money tree" mentality and looking for a daily source of new revenue to use as you would, this may not be the best option. If, however, you are looking for a scalable investment option, Mintage is an excellent high-return-low-maintanence platform.
  • suffers a mixed reputation due to online slander: It's true. It's true. There are some out there doubtful of Mintage's integrity and legitimacy. Many of them also seem to have a consistent tendency to slander Mintage and then promoting some other offer they believe in. A classic if immature and destructive sales technique. But, to be fair, always do your research. If you are curious about actual results with Mintage, contact us and we'll show you.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

FINAL THOUGHTS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

We really believe in what Mintage is providing. Of course we recommend you do your due dilligence before making your decision. But we think you will be impressed by your results if you do decide to join. They are providing a solid opportunity in a market that is really only just beginning. The potential of what could come to the cryptocurrency mining market in the years to come is difficult to make an accurate estimate about. However, there never really has been an opportunity quite like this. The chances are that, if you get involved now you will be glad you did.

What we like the most about Mintage is their low buy in limit: $25 USD. Yes, we do recommend putting in more if you can as your gains will compound far more quickly.

 

So, with that, thank you for reading and we hope to hear from you soon.

LEARN MORE:

If you would like to know more about Mintage Mining, please contact us at:

admin@bitcoinbuildify.com

Be sure to include:

  • your first name
  • what service you are interested in
  • how best to correspond with you.

We prefer Zoom or Skype as this is the fastest and most direct way to show you how the tech works and to take care of any questions you may have. But we're ok with email, too.

We have a little more of an old school approach to servicing our clients:

  • no automated emails,
  • no affiliate link buttons
  • no hiding who we are

We believe in quality over quantity and want our customers to have a full understanding and appreciation of what theyre getting into. This helps us just as much as it helps you.

Once you send us an email, a real human will get in touch with you within 48 hours at the most. None of the information you share with us will be made available to any 3rd parties without first getting your interest and permission to do so. We hate spam just as much as you do.

If you are a spammer, you will be put directly straight onto our naughtly list :-(

Have a nice day.

 

BITCOIN BUILDIFY: MAKING CRYPTO EASY

item.title: Why the "Wolf of Wall Street" is wrong about Bitcoin.
item.dc:creator: Trevor272
item.content:encoded:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="3.0.89" custom_padding="25.9375px|0px|0px|0px"][et_pb_row custom_padding="12.9688px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

Don't have time to read the whole blog post?

Click on the video to watch or listen to the author's commentary.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_video src="https://youtu.be/yElH1SaQ7ck" image_src="//i.ytimg.com/vi/yElH1SaQ7ck/hqdefault.jpg" _builder_version="3.0.89" max_width="87%" module_alignment="center"][/et_pb_video][et_pb_image src="http://bitcoinbuildify.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/jordan-belfort-e1520075625610.jpg" align="center" _builder_version="3.0.89"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"] Jordan Belfort, AKA "The Wolf of Wall Street" has come out publicly speaking against Bitcoin calling it things like a "huge danger" and a "bubble for sure". Click here to see the article. For those who haven't seen the movie or aren't familiar with his sordid history in finance, I would highly recommend watching it. It's good for a laugh and, more soberingly, a trip into a fine example of the types of minds Wall Street tends to attract. Nothing against the guy but suffice to say he has a rather interesting position to speak from. As one who has stood on the other side of scam after scam and lived to profit from it, why should we take his opinion on the world's oldest and most highly valued cryptocurrency? The answer is this: you probably shouldn't. Yes, "The Wolf" knows his way around the stock market. He knows how to find an angle and reel in the profits. He knows sales and he knows money. But, here's a surprising thing: comparing Bitcoin to the many ludicrous schemes churned out by Wall Street in the past is a bit like comparing an abacus to a smartphone. Just because someone has been in traditional finance doesn't mean they know what they're talking about when it comes to Bitcoin. Like, at all.And that's especially true when you consider thatBitcoin has almost nothing to do with traditional finance whatsoever at all. In fact, it could hardly be more different. This general lack of understanding of Bitcoin (and its ever growing cohort of similar technologies) has not served its reputation well. And it has probably delayed its rised to the mainstream for the majority of its short existence (9 years of as of January 2018). Thankfully, things are changing. And as Bitcoin continues its rise into the mainstream such terms as "blockchain" and "cryptocurrency" will inevitably become more common as will an understanding of what they are and how they work. For the time being, however, Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies exist in a kind of grayzone. They are, however, slowly but surely coming into the limelight. Be that as it may, when someone comes out and blatantly calls the entire movement "a bubble" we should really question what their rationale behind saying so is. Especially when you consider that, by the same criteria, the entire world economy could just as easily be called a bubble. Didn't hear that one on CNN? Yeah, me neither. The thing is, the term "bubble" can be a rather misleading term and, in cases concerning a new technology and its rise in popularity, can be thrown around all too easily. However, could Mr. Belfort be right? Could Bitcoin really be a bubble that's going to pop and leave "all those suckers who should've known better" holding the bag? Will all the Jamie Dimons and Jordan Belforts of the world get to puff out their chests and say "I told you so" right there on the TV? Methinks not. Ok. To be fair. Probably not. Yes, the waters of the cryptocurrency world stretch as yet untested. The technology is new, little understood by the majority and the whole thing can come off as something out of a video game that got taken way too seriously. Digital money? But the truth is cryptocurrency technologies, most notably Bitcoin with its seniority as the first successful endeavor of its kind, are showing enormous promise and all of the signs ofnot being a fad. If anything, they could very well be a revolution. On top of that, there are a lot of people making a lot of money with them. A LOT of money. First, can Jordan Belfort make any accurate statement about Bitcoin without comparing it to some sleazy, closet Ponzi scheme based on fiat currency? It is extremely doubtful he can. And, frankly, making a comparison between Bitcoin and basically anything Wall Street touches is, well, a bit of a stretch. And that is because, presently, all of Wall Street and the global finance markets as well are tied up in what basically boils down to Monopoly money. By that I mean the money can be printed at will and is controlled 100% by institutions with vested interest in controlling and profiting from the people who use it. Bitcoin doesn't follow this pattern at all. Bitcoin is not controlled by any institutions and it cannot be created at will. So this throws a very different light on the subject. Viewed from the outside, it's rather easy to doubt the skyrocketing value of Bitcoin or the huge number of both individuals and companies alike getting behind it. In 2017 alone Bitcoin went from an average of $967 in January to an average of $13,860 by December. That's an increase of %1400 in 12 months. Looking at data like that it's very easy to think "tulip bubble" or something along the lines of "The Empror's New Clothes". And there's nothing wrong with that, again, if you're strictly looking at it from the outside. And the question of why are all these people going so crazy about Bitcoin is a perfectly normal thing to ask. So... [/et_pb_text][et_pb_image _builder_version="3.0.89"][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="3.0.89" custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px"][et_pb_row custom_padding="12.9688px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

WHAT IS GOING ON WITH BITCOIN?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="3.0.89" custom_padding="0px|0px|25px|0px"][et_pb_row custom_padding="2px|0px|27px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"] First let's talk about the data. Yes, 2017, especially the latter half, did see a remarkable rise in the price of Bitcoin. It was crazy. And the world had never seen anything like it. It was also followed in early 2018 by a remarkable drop in value as the last section on the graph shows. Here's the thing you probably haven't heard on the news: This is a historic pattern with Bitcoin. Yes, nearly every year since its inception Bitcoin has started the year small and finished big. There have been exceptions, of course. Most notably 2014. But the general trend of Bitcoin has been, well, up. Click through the slides below showing the fluctuations in Bitcoin prices from 2012 to 2017 to see for yourself. [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="4px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids="273,274,275,276,277,278" gallery_captions=",,,,," fullwidth="on" _builder_version="3.0.89" pagination_font="||||||||" box_shadow_style="preset2"][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="0px|0px|0px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"] What made 2017 unique was that the typical annual rise in price finally broke through a level of magnitude that got A LOT of people's attention. Look at it this way: if Bitcoin (or any other cryptocurrency for that matter) sees a %1400 percent rise in value when it's only selling for $0.02 it will end up being (wait for it) $0.28. That is still an incredible rise in value percentage-wise but, let's face it, something being worth 28 cents isn't exactly going to knock anyone's socks off. It's only when the value really starts taking off that people begin to notice. I would agree that the classic phenomenon of "buying the rumor and selling the news" had a hand in 2017's massive gains but not altogether. Not at all. Bitcoin, despite sometimes massive drops in value, has consistently and relentlessly been on the rise. It doesn't have anything to do with some kind of scam being suddenly launched on the unsuspecting public. It doesn't have anything to do with any institutions or governments inflating yet another ridiculous profit making scheme bound to fatten CEOs and those less endowed with humanity on Wall Street while eventually screwing everyone else. Bitcoin's rise in value has to do with one thing and one thing only: Bitcoin. Which brings us to the next question: WHY? Yes, indeed, whyare people going so crazy about Bitcoin? Aside from the hype. Aside from the FUD (Fear And Doubt). And aside from the FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out). Bitcoin actualy represents significant opportunities. It is also a forerunner in what is proving to be an entirely new type of technology. Let me explain further. And to do that, we have to define what Bitcoin is. Bitcoin is a new type of technology, not just a new currency. And anyone who wants to know what makes it so unique and promising will have to put some serous time and effort into learning about it. For all of its simplicity, it is a completely revolutionary platform. So it does not fit any existing definition for other technologies. It is also somewhat difficult to make an accurate comparison between Bitcoin and other technologies. So, to keep this article moving, let's use the most basic definition: Bitcoin is the first successful decentralized digital currency. As such, it allows peer to peer, instead of the more traditional peer to institution to peer, transactions that we're used to. It is also based on a trustless system. A "trustless system" is one where you don't have to blindly entrust any information or funds to any one entity hoping they will do their job but not having a 100% guarantee they will. This is an ancient problem sometimes called the "Byzantine General's Problem" and one no financial, government or commercial system in the history of the world has been able to completely eliminate it; until now. With the Bitcoin blockchain, one individual can send funds to another individual anywhere on the planet without a trusted 3rd party. And the transaction will be totally secure and verified. This means you don't need a bank or bank account, you don't need fees, you don't have to entrust your money to anyone and you don't have to leave a record of what you are spending it on. This actually has amazing implications that people and companies alike are just beginning to realize. Actually, Bitcoin is not the first attempt at a purely digital currency. There were attempts at creating such a thing as far back as the 1960's and 1970's. But there was a really big problem called "the double spending problem" that constantly defeated all efforts. The double spending problem refers to the difficulty of creating a digital file which cannot be successfully duplicated. Being able to duplicate a file is great for being able to share information and make access easier but it creates some really big problems when it comes to money. The way Bitcoin solved this was by using what has come to be known as the "blockchain". The Blockchain is a decentralized ledger with both verifies and records all transactions. It sounds complicated but the principles are actually very elegant and simple. This is part of what makes it so secure and efficient. [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

WHY ARE WE HEARING MORE AND MORE ABOUT BITCOIN?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"] So far, Bitcoin's performance has been flawless. And the more this continues to be the case, the more people are going to take notice. All new technologies go through a few general phases:
  • inception: the idea of the technology. A good example is the airplane. The idea is ancient but very few ever acted on it and far, far fewer were successful. For a very long time, the best people could do were hot air balloons or simple gliders that were often death traps.
  • creation: the implementation of the technology. The first successful flight of an engine powered airplane was December 17, 1903. It was a bit rickety and not very long but proved that manmade machines could fly under their own power. It wasn't just an idea anymore.
  • use/pioneer stage: people using the technology. For about 10 years after the Wright Brothers, powered flight remained in the "pioneer stage".
  • adoption: the spread of the technology. The years during and following WWI saw a massive increase in the technology of flight and it's use up to and including the rocket technology of the 50's and 60's.
  • mass adoption: the spread of the use of the technology to a level where it reaches a critical mass and becomes mainstream to the point of entering daily language and everday use. The first commercial jet flight happened in 1952. It was the beginning of a new phase in technology where people, for the first time were able to cross oceans in relative safety within hours instead of weeks.
  • normalization: the point where the technology becomes so common place that people don't think about it and may actually have trouble imagining life without it. As of 2014, there were an average of102,465 commercial jet flightsper day or roughly 37.4 million per year.
Personally, I believe Bitcoin is at the point of adoption. Many of the pioneers of the use of the technology (the luckiest computer nerds in the history of the world) are now multi-millionaires. And the price, while sometimes falling, has shown consistent upward trends. With each passing day, more people and institutions are getting on board with this new type of technology. And so there must be reasons for this. What are they? Well, for the long answerclick here to our "What I Is Crypto Currency?" page. For the short answer, read the list below: convenience: Bitcoin offers extreme convenience. With the blockchain technology, you can make a transfer to anyone anywhere anytime - in about 10 minutes. Actual times may vary but it is still far less time than any bank could do it in. security: the nature of the blockchain is about secuirty and verifiability. Some refer to the blockchain as "triple entry book keeping" ( one entry for deposit, one entry for withdrawal and a third via distributed verification across the block chain) and consider it a vast improvement over the standard double entry book keeping still used by every institution in the world since it was first devised in 1494. Yes, 524 years ago. anonymity: although not 100% absolutely anonymous, the Bitcoin block chain offers a much higher degree of privacy than any 3rd party ever could. opportunity: there is a lot of opportunity in Bitcoin and block chain technology. More than most people realize. Be it opportunity for investment, development or simply a better way of doing things this technology shows incredible promise. independence:with its trustless network and no need for a 3rd party, Bitcoin delivers an unprecedented amount of independence to its users. This is great not only for your average Jane or Joe in the developed world but also carries huge potential for the over 3 billion people living in the undeveloped world where lack of infrastructure and the fees involved in banking simply make modern life impossible. [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="0px|0px|27px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

WHY BITCOIN IS NOT A BUBBLE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="0px|0px|27px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"] A bubble, by definition, is a sudden surge of activity or force to a degree that is unsustainable and eventually makes whatever is being strained go "pop". In the case of a financial bubble it is usually a trend in lending or some kind of bizarre financial product that lets people make money out of thin air. It is a house of cards. People and institutions will run with it like a herd of proverbial lemmings right off of a cliff. We've seen it again and again. With Bitcoin, we are not seeing anything unsustainable. We are seeing, instead, an increased rate of adoption and use of a relatively new technology. There is a very, very big difference here. If we are willing to accept that Bitcoin is a bubble then, by the same rationale, we would also have to accept that other technologies like cars, airplanes, smartphones and just about every invention of the past 5000+ years are also bubbles. This obviously doesn't make any sense which is why I believe the Wolf of Wall Street is mistaken. Take a look at the image below showing the increase in the number of active Bitcoin wallet users over the course of 2015-2017. [/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src="http://bitcoinbuildify.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/btc-wallet-increase-from-2015-2017-e1520067566257.jpg" _builder_version="3.0.89"][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]The reasons why there are so many more active wallet users may be debatable but the data regarding their numbers is not. One thing is clear, more and more people are becoming involved with using Bitcoin every year. For more facts and statistics outlining the growth of Bitcoin demand, we recommend the article, "Bitcoin by Numbers: 21 Statistics That Reveal Growing Demand for the Cryptocurrency"writtenNov 11, 2017by Kai Sedgwick.You can read it by clicking here.[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

FINAL THOUGHTS: WHY BITCOIN MAY POSSIBLY BEUNDERVALUED. NOT OVERVALUED

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"] This topic is going to be expanded on in another article but I'd like to share the basic idea here. And that's because it sheds some light on one more reason why Bitcoin (and other cryptocurrencies) is not a bubble. Yes, my personal opinion is that Bitcoin may actually be undervalued. Not overvalued. And my reasons are the same reasons that have ever made any currency valuable: scarcity and use. Scarcity:the total amount of Bitcoin is limited. There will only ever be 21,000,000 Bitcoin in the world and no new Bitcoin will ever be made. Actually, no new Bitcoincan be made becausse they would not be verifiable on the blockchain. There are currently16,896,925 Bitcoinon the market. Of those, some 5 million are estimated to have been lost because of lost keys and hardware or destruction of the computers the Bitcoin were on. Sad but true and there are quite a few stories about these types of incidents. Further, the total supply of Bitcoin is capped at 21,000,000. And the last Bitcoin will not be available until 2040. Scarcity constricts the supply side of the supply and demand equation which means it will always have value for those demanding it. And increasingly more people are. Use: this is the demand part of the supply and demand equation. If something is being used by a lot of people it gives it something called "liquidity" meaning basically that it can be used very easily and very quickly. Think buying something with cash vs. buying something with a kitchen table: far more people will take the cash than the kitchen table in exchange for whatever goods or service you are buying. Because the technological advantage of Bitcoin offers so much over the traditional finance system, use will likely continue to grow and grow at the same rate and to the same degree as other revolutionary technologies have on their road to mainstream adoption. Think laptop or smartphone. 20 years ago, no one had them. Now just about everybody does. So, in conclusion, I feel it's safe to say Stay in touch for our next article that will expand on this topic. It should be up by next week. In the meantime, if you'd like to learn a little more about some of the thinking among supporters of Bitcoin, watch the video below: [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_row custom_padding="0px|0px|27px|0px" _builder_version="3.0.89"][et_pb_column type="4_4" _builder_version="3.0.47" parallax="off" parallax_method="on"][et_pb_video src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N6NscwzbMvI" src_webm="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N6NscwzbMvI" _builder_version="3.0.89"][/et_pb_video][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.0.89"]

PSST. Are you interested in getting involved in cryptocurrencies?

If you want to learn about the service provders we work with, Mintage Mining and Crypto World Evolution click through to read about them. Or you can alwayssend us an email at: admin@bitcoinbuildify.com Be sure to include:
  • your first name
  • what service you are interested in
  • how best to correspond with you.
We prefer Zoom or Skype as this is the fastest and most direct way to show you how the tech works and to take care of any questions you may have. But were ok with email, too. We have a little more of an old school approach to servicing our clients:
  • no automated emails,
  • no affiliate link buttons
  • no hiding who we are
We believe in quality over quantity and want our customers to have a full understanding and appreciation of what theyre getting into. This helps us just as much as it helps you. Once you send us an email, a real human will get in touch with you within 48 hours at the most. None of the information you share with us will be made available to any 3rd parties without first getting your interest and permission to do so. We hate spam just as much as you do. If you are a spammer, you will be put directly straight onto our naughtly list Have a nice day.

BITCOIN BUILDIFY: MAKING CRYPTO EASY

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Jordan Belfort, AKA "The Wolf of Wall Street" has come out publicly speaking against Bitcoin calling it a "huge danger" and a "bubble for sure". For those who haven't seen the movie or aren't familiar with his sordid history in finance, suffice to say he has a rather "interesting" position to speak from. As one who has stood on the other side of scam after scam and lived to profit from it, why should we take his opinion on the world's oldest and most highly valued cryptocurrency? The answer is this: you probably shouldn't.

Yes, "The Wolf" knows his way around the stock market. He knows how to find an angle and reel in the profits with all the predatory gusto and bravo of the many others like him (nothing against the guy, but let's be honest). But, here's a surprising thing: the number of people in finance who actually understand cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology really isn't that big. Just because someone has been in traditional finance doesn't mean they know what they're talking about when it comes to Bitcoin, at all.

Could Mr. Belfort be right? Yes, of course. Is there any evidence to support the idea that Bitcoin is a huge danger or a bubble? Well, some but not much.

Viewed from the outside, it's rather easy to doubt the skyrocketing value of Bitcoin or the huge number of both individuals and companies alike getting behind it. In 2017 alone Bitcoin went from an average of $967 in January to an average of $13,860 by December. That's an increase of %1400 in 12 months.

It's very easy to think "tulip bubble" or something along the lines of "The Empror's New Clothes". And there's nothing wrong with that, again, if you're strictly looking at it from the outside.
Why the Wolf Of Wall Street is Wrong about Bitcoin
Wall Street and Cryptocurrencies don't have as much in common as you might think. Here we give some key reasons as to why the Wolf Of Wall Street is most probably wrong about his opinion on Bitcoin.
